bttNewFile.title: Create new instance
bttNewFile.subtitle: This action creates another instance (window) of the text editor.

bttOpenFile.title: Open File
bttOpenFile.subtitle: Pops up a file dialog to choose the file to be opened and appended to the text editor.

bttSaveFile.title: Save File
bttSaveFile.subtitle: Pops up a file dialog to choose for the location of file to be written into.

bttUndo.title: Undo Button
bttUndo.subtitle: Undo your previous actions on the text editor by clicking this button.

bttRedo.title: Redo Button
bttRedo.subtitle: Redo your undone actions on the text editor by clicking this button.

bttCopy.title: Copy Button
bttCopy.subtitle: It copies the selected text to clipboard.

bttCut.title: Cut Button
bttCut.subtitle: It copies the selected text to clipboard and deletes it.

bttPaste.title: Paste Button
bttPaste.subtitle: It pastes copied text in the cursor position

bttSelectWord.title: Select Word Button
bttSelectWord.subtitle: Selects the word found in the cursor position.

bttSelectAll.title: Select All Button
bttSelectAll.subtitle: Selects the whole text inside the text editor.

bttSelectLine.title: Select Line Button
bttSelectLine.subtitle: Select the whole line found in the cursor position

bttHelpButton.title: Help Button
bttHelpButton.subtitle: When clicked, the next clicked button will show a description of itself.

footer.title: Grammar Picker
footer.subtitle: Chooses and displays the programming language grammar of the file.
